## Shared functions

Counts 
```{r}
summarize_patient_counts <- function(dataset) {
  dataset %>%
    group_by(assessment_context_label) %>%
    summarize(
      patient_count = n_distinct(respondent_id),
      .groups = "drop"
    )
}
```
